headline: Why CooperCompanies (COO) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of medical device company CooperCompanies (NASDAQ:COO) jumped 3.5% in the morning session after its Board of Directors approved a $1 billion increase to the company's share repurchase program, bringing the total authorization to $2 billion.
